title: Researchers study plant aging, gain insights into crop yields and more

title_detail.value: Researchers study plant aging, gain insights into crop yields and more

summary: New insights into the mechanism behind how plants age may help scientists better understand crop yields, nutrient allocation, and even the timing and duration of fall leaf color.

summary_detail.value: New insights into the mechanism behind how plants age may help scientists better understand crop yields, nutrient allocation, and even the timing and duration of fall leaf color.
